author: PT-10
message: change fsdp_strategy to fsdp in TrainingArguments in accelerate doc (#38807)

files.patch:
@@ -75,7 +75,7 @@ training_args = TrainingArguments(
     per_device_eval_batch_size=16,
     num_train_epochs=2,

-    fsdp_strategy="full_shard",
+    fsdp="full_shard",
     weight_decay=0.01,
     eval_strategy="epoch",
     save_strategy="epoch",
